t: Amazon.com: Greatest Hits[2 LP]: CDs & Vinyl
s: Couldn't wait to get this as I'd been eyeing a Police LP for years now. Not only are you getting some of the greatest songs of our lifetime in one collection, the sound quality is nothing short of amazing. The mastering is easily the best in my entire collection and there really are nuances I've never heard before despite growing up with all of these songs. It's like hearing them the way they were meant to be heard for the first time. The cover is really well done too. An essential vinyl ...
